snippet.title: Bail or Jail - Teaser Trailer - Steam®
snippet.description:
Bail or Jail demo version has been released !

" Come on. Let's play with Monster !"

A thrilling game of tag that ends within 3 minutes! The Human team keeps themselves out of a holding cell, the Monster team must capture all Humans by using skills before time runs out! Enjoy the game both online and offline in groups of up to 4 players! Let's play "Bail or Jail" together !

More information on the official website below

Official Web Site
https://freestyle-games.jp/obakeidoro-steam

Steam Store
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1715980

Official Twitter
https://twitter.com/BailorJail_en
